title: 'Still Alice' Is A Triumph For Julianne Moore, But The Rest Of Film Is Thin
teaser: The movie is based on neuroscientist Lisa Genova's novel about a linguistics professor with early-onset Alzheimer's disease. While Moore is fascinating, the rest of the characters are half-formed.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
